settings.value:
We deliver to over 100 countries around the world.

For full details of the delivery options we offer, please view our Delivery Info

We hope you’ll love every River Island purchase, but if you ever need to return an item you can do so within 14 days of receipt.

For full details of how to make a return, please view our Returns Policy

ONE of the following as proof of identity:

• Cheque Guarantee/Debit Card
• Bank/Building Society Book
• Valid Passport
• Cheque Book
• Driving Licence

For Under 18's: 
National Insurance Card, Medical Card or Savings Book
